title: The two charters granted by King Charles IId to the proprietors of Carolina with the first and last fundamental constitutions of that colony.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Richard Parker ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

The first charter granted by King Charles IId to the proprietors of Carolina (March 24, 1663) -- The second charter (June 30, 1665) -- The fundamental constitutions of Carolina (March 1, 1669; drawn up by John Locke) -- Copy of the fundamental constitutions of Carolina (April 11, 1698).
